abilities.name: Shadow Connection
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Darkness Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nocturnal Maneuvers GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for any number of Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
